alert.note: Alert for Clarke (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 16 at 11:01PM CDT until July 17 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... A Dam Break on the Archusa Creek and Chickasaway below Archusa Creek Water Park Lake Dam in... Central Clarke County in east central Mississippi... * Until 515 AM CDT Monday. * At 1101 PM CDT, dam operators continued to report the failure of the western spillway of Archusa Creek Water Park Lake Dam causing flash flooding downstream on the Archusa Creek and in bank rises along the Chickasawhay River. HAZARD...Flash flooding from the failure of Archusa Creek Water Park Lake Dam. SOURCE...Dam operator. IMPACT...Flooding of areas downstream from the Archusa Creek Water Park Lake Dam along the Archusa Creek and moderate in bank rises along the Chickasawhay River. * The nearest downstream location is along Desoto Landing where moderate in bank rises will occur during the early morning hours of Monday. Flooding is occurring along Archusa Creek and moderate in bank rises are occurring as water moves down the Chickasawhay River. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED DAM FAILURE...OCCURRING
info.instruction: If you are in low lying areas below the Archusa Creek Water Park Lake Dam you should move to higher ground immediately. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
